title: Heating curve - what happens at boiling point

content.question: Which of the following best describes what happens to the substance between t4 and t5?

choices.label: The molecules are leaving the liquid phase.
The solid and liquid phases coexist in equilibrium.
The vapor pressure of the substance is decreasing.
The average intermolecular distance is decreasing.

content.answer: The molecules are leaving the liquid phase.

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
